pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This package contains some tools for processing BAM files including
bamcollate2: reads BAM and writes BAM reordered such that alignment or collated by query name bammarkduplicates: reads BAM and writes BAM with duplicate alignments marked using the BAM flags field bammaskflags: reads BAM and writes BAM while masking (removing) bits from the flags column bamrecompress: reads BAM and writes BAM with a defined compression setting. This tool is capable of multi-threading. bamsort: reads BAM and writes BAM resorted by coordinates or query name bamtofastq: reads BAM and writes FastQ; output can be collated or uncollated by query name
